sub_title: Engineer at ASML | Associate in Project Management | Data Science
summary:
Engineer with expertise in production management, working in the photolithography field.
I’m well-versed in planning and development, relationship management, operations and time management.

I have a keen interest in Project Management and Data Science - Analyzing data and transforming data sets into insights that are used to set critical decisions that impact company-wide initiatives.

If you want to know more, contact me via PM.
